title: End of the road: The Xbox 360 game marketplace will shut down
description: Players will still be able to download previously purchased games.

title: Western Digital, SanDisk Extreme SSDs don’t store data safely, lawsuit says
description: The suit is seeking class-action certification.

title: Heavy, highly magnetic star may be first magnetar precursor we’ve seen
description: A strange history has produced a helium-rich star with kilogauss magnetic fields.

title: Microsoft AI suggests food bank as a “cannot miss” tourist spot in Canada
description: AI-penned Microsoft Travel article recommends food bank as if it were a famous restaurant.

title: Mars keeps spinning faster every year, NASA InSight data says
description: Radio signals from the lander help us track Mars' spin as it slowly shifts.

title: Buyers of Bored Ape NFTs sue after digital apes turn out to be bad investment
description: Lawsuit: Sotheby's $24M sale to FTX gave Bored Ape NFTs "an air of legitimacy."

title: Dealmaster: Early Labor Day deals on laptops, smartphones, and more
description: Early Labor Day sales bring terrific savings on some of our tech favorites.

title: Can coffee or a nap make up for sleep deprivation?
description: Lack of sleep harms memory and cognition, but our easy remedies can't fix everything.

title: Report: Potential NYT lawsuit could force OpenAI to wipe ChatGPT and start over
description: OpenAI could be fined up to $150,000 for each piece of infringing content.

title: Acura unveils its first GM-based electric vehicle, the new ZDX
description: This new electric SUV shares a lot with the Cadillac Lyriq.

title: Lenovo’s answer to Steam Deck, Legion Go, sports Switch-like detachable controls
description: Product shots also show off kickstand, large 8" screen, and tons of buttons.

title: Want to have your genes tested? It might be genetic
description: People in a genetic database have segments of DNA in common unexpectedly often.
